Commands.Elixir Field: 2-HIT AoE melee BRV+HP attack  HP damage dealt is split amongst all enemies  Grants 「Small Max BRV Up」 and 「Small Attack Up」 to party for 3 turns
Commands.Riddle of Fire: Raises party BRV based on Attack  Grants 「Fists of Fire」 for 5 turns  Low Action Delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count   While 「Fists of Fire」 is active:  - Turns to 「Fire Tackle」  　∟ Raises party BRV based on Attack  　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  　∟ Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets   「Fists of Fire」 has the following effects:  - Raises own Max BRV and Attack  - Raises party Initial BRV  - Grants 「BRV Regen」 to party
Commands.Fists of Fire Long Attack: Marginally raises own Attack for 3 turns  Extends the duration of 「Fists of Fire」 by 3 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Brotherhood & The Forbidden Chakra: Raises own BRV based on Attack  Grants 「Brotherhood」 for 6 turns  Triggers 「The Forbidden Chakra」 afterwards  　∟ 5-HIT AoE melee BRV+HP attack  　∟ Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target  　∟ BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  　∟ HP damage dealt is split amongst all enemies  　∟ Extends existing 「Fists of Fire」 by 1 turn   While 「Chakra Gauge」 is at 5  - Turns to 「Brotherhood & The Forbidden Chakra+」  　∟ Increased potency and improved effects　∟ Consumes entire 「Chakra Gauge」 after use   「Brotherhood」 has the following effects:  - Raises own Max BRV and Attack  - Increases 「Chakra Gauge」 by 1 when an ally uses an ability (excluding Additional Ability and enhanced BRV/HP Attack)   「Chakra Gauge」 increases by 1 after using an ability (excluding Additional Ability and enhanced BRV/HP Attack)  Maxed at 5

Passives.Elixir Field Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Elixir Field
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy
Passives.Fire Tackle Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Fire Tackle
Passives.Back Attack: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt when attacking an enemy targeting self
Passives.Ability Attack High: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt when using abilities continuously (including enhanced BRV/HP Attack)
Passives.In Crimson It Began: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack while  Fists of Fire  is active
Passives.Buff Boost Speed: Moderately raises Max BRV and slightly Speed while buffed
Passives.Elixir Field Extend: When using  Elixir Field :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 5- Moderately raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Extends the duration of  Max BRV Up  and  Attack Up  by 5 turns
Passives.Buff Base Attack: Moderately raises Initial BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.Riddle of Fire Extend: Riddle of Fire  use +2When using  Riddle of Fire :- Extends the duration of  Fists of Fire  by 5 turns- No Action DelayWhen using  Fire Tackle :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 5- Tremendously raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRVWhile  Fists of Fire  is active:- Turns  BRV Attack  to  BRV Attack+ :   Increases the number of BRV hits to 2   Greatly raises total BRV potency- Turns  HP Attack  to  HP Attack+ :   Raises own BRV based on Attack   1-HIT melee BRV+HP attack   Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets
Passives.Radiance of Bravery and Power: Raises Initial BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Fists of Fire Long Attack Extend: When using  Fists of Fire Long Attack :- Slightly improves  Attack Up  effect

Weapons.Ala Mhigan Fist CP: 15: When using  Elixir Field :- Raises BRV potency- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target- Improves  Max BRV Up  and  Attack Up  buffs
Weapons.Jikki CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Brotherhood & The Forbidden Chakra Grants special effect  Chakra Gauge
Weapons.Lost Allagan Knuckle CP: 35: When using  Riddle of Fire :- Raises the BRV Gain based on Attack- Improves the effects of  Fists of Fire When using  Fire Tackle :- Raises the BRV Gain based on Attack- Raises BRV potency- Raises HP damage dealt to non-targets
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Fists of Fire Long Attack  use +1Duration of  Fists of Fire Long  effects +2 turns
